@blockly/theme-dark

A Blockly dark theme.

Installation

Yarn

yarn add @blockly/theme-dark

npm

npm install @blockly/theme-dark --save

Usage

import * as Blockly from 'blockly';
import DarkTheme from '@blockly/theme-dark';

Blockly.inject('blocklyDiv', {
  theme: DarkTheme,
});

License

Apache 2.0
